meanings.sent1: The boat was sailless, so it used a motor instead.
meanings.sent2: The sailless ship relied on its engine to move across the water.
meanings.sent3: The sailless vessel looked like it was missing something important.
meanings.sent4: The sailless yacht seemed to long for the wind to fill its nonexistent sails.
meanings.sent5: The sailless boat appeared incomplete without its traditional sails.

meanings.sent1: The sailless vessel had a sleek design for speed.
meanings.sent2: The modern sailless boat had a high-tech propulsion system.
meanings.sent3: The sailless craft was a marvel of engineering without traditional sails.
meanings.sent4: The sailless ship cut through the water like a knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The sailless yacht was a symbol of innovation in maritime technology.

meanings.sent1: The sailless boat had a clean deck without any masts.
meanings.sent2: The sailless vessel had a streamlined appearance without sails.
meanings.sent3: The sailless ship looked like a giant floating bathtub without sails.
meanings.sent4: The sailless yacht glided silently across the water without billowing sails.
meanings.sent5: The sailless craft moved gracefully through the waves without any sails to catch the wind.
